properties.description: This pipeline will copy objects from one group. The objects belonging to this group will be copied parallelly.

activities.name: ListObjectsFromOneGroup
activities.description: List objects from one group and iterate each of them to downstream activities

activities.name: RouteJobsBasedOnLoadingBehavior
activities.description: Check the loading behavior for each object if it requires full load or incremental load. If it is Default or FullLoad case, do full load. If it is DeltaLoad case, do incremental load.

activities.name: FullLoadOneObject
activities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination

activities.name: GetMaxWatermarkValue
activities.description: Query the source object to get the max value from watermark column

activities.name: DeltaLoadOneObject
activities.description: Copy the changed data only from last time via comparing the value in watermark column to identify changes.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from [@{json(item().SourceObjectSettings).schema}].[@{json(item().SourceObjectSettings).table}] 
    where [@{json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnName}] > @{if(contains(json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnType, 'Int'),
    json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnStartValue, 
    concat('''', json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnStartValue, ''''))}
    and [@{json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnName}] <= @{if(contains(json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnType, 'Int'),
    activity('GetMaxWatermarkValue').output.firstRow.CurrentMaxWaterMarkColumnValue, 
    concat('''', activity('GetMaxWatermarkValue').output.firstRow.CurrentMaxWaterMarkColumnValue, ''''))}

defaultActivities.name: DefaultFullLoadOneObject
defaultActivities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination

properties.description: Pipeline to copy Blob data to my ADLS, HIV data

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/pl copy tables to adls usind dynamic parameters')]
[concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/pl copy tables to adls using dynamic parameters')]

properties.description: Automated Pipeline that ingests raw data, cleans and enriches it using data flow mapping and loads it into curated gold layer tables in Synapse Analytics

activities.name: Copy Desserts4all Landing to Bronze
activities.description: copy Desserts4all CSV files to Bronze Container using a storage event trigger with logging enable in landing container

activities.name: Delete CSV files
activities.description: Delete CSV files in Landing Container that have been copied to the bronze container

dependsOn.activity: Wait to delete raw input files

activities.name: Wait to delete raw input files

properties.description: pipeline to convert different files to Sql

activities.name: Copy data to auto created table

properties.description:
copy and convert a set of tables to csv files using adf
source sqldb
sink adls

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT *
FROM mydbtestadf001.information_schema.tables
WHERE Table_Schema = 'SalesLT' AND Table_Type = 'base table'

properties.description: creating additional fileds (columns) at the destination also using dynamic contents (expressions)

activities.name: copy sweet treats to a table
activities.description: lesson learnt when creating new columns, using the pre-copy script at the sink the fields are created but the data did not copy, I had to go back to remove the pre-copy script and debug the pipeline.

sink.preCopyScript:
alter table [dbo].[newtable]
add AuditId uniqueidentifier null, FilePath nvarchar (500)

activities.name: Get Metadata of Get Metadata Activity
activities.description:
dynamic Get Metadata using
Last Modified Data

dependsOn.activity: Get Metadata of Get Metadata Activity

activities.name: Copy multiple csv files into a sqldb table sales_LOAD
